pages.text: The $(item)Brazier$() is an essential tool for $(l:bewitchment:curses/curse_intro)$(marked)curses$().$(br)Other than that, it can be used for $(l:bewitchment:tools/incense)$(marked)incense$().$(br)A Brazier can take up to four items. To start using it, you need to light it using a $(item)Flint and Steel$().
For convenience, Braziers can also be attached to ceilings.
